response.original_title: Josh Groban from Madison Square Garden
response.overview: Captured live from his sold-out performance, Josh Groban from Madison Square Garden features a full concert performance with Josh’s band, choir and orchestra along with very special guests Idina Menzel and Jennifer Nettles.
response.tagline: Captured live from his sold-out performance, Josh Groban from Madison Square Garden features a full concert performance with Josh’s band, choir and orchestra along with very special guests Idina Menzel and Jennifer Nettles.
response.title: Josh Groban from Madison Square Garden
